Authors: Muhardany, Suharjito, Sukmadhani A.A., Gunawan E.
Title: Development of E-commerce approach to service oriented architecture using SOMA methodology
Source title: Proceedings of 2020 International Conference on Information Management and Technology, ICIMTech 2020
Affiliations: BINUS Graduate Program - Master of Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Computer Science Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; BINUS Online Learning, Bina Nusantara University, Computer Science Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Muhardany, BINUS Graduate Program - Master of Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Computer Science Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Suharjito, BINUS Graduate Program - Master of Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Computer Science Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Sukmadhani, A.A., BINUS Online Learning, Bina Nusantara University, Computer Science Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Gunawan, E., BINUS Online Learning, Bina Nusantara University, Computer Science Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Abstract: This study aims to provide solutions to problems in the e-commerce system at PT. XYZ This is due to the number of bugs in the e-commerce system at PT. XYZ Some products cannot enter the shopping design page; there are no features that should be available in e-commerce systems such as shipping costs. An e-commerce system with a Service Oriented Architecture (SOA) approach is needed to overcome these problems. The results of the study found that several web services can be combined into one part to help the development process become better and easier. © 2020 IEEE.
Author Keywords: E-Commerce; Service Oriented Architecture; SOMA; Web Services
Index Keywords: Electronic commerce; Information management; Information services; Product design; Program debugging; Web services; Development process; E-commerce systems; One parts; Shipping cost; Service oriented architecture (SOA)
